interface.name: com.citrix.xenclient.usbdaemon
interface.tp:docstring: Interface to the USB policy daemon.

method.name: get_policy_domuuid
method.tp:docstring: Query the USB device policy for a specified VM.

arg.name: uuid
arg.tp:docstring: UUID of VM to query policy for.

arg.name: value
arg.tp:docstring: Policy for specified VM, as XML.

method.name: set_policy_domuuid
method.tp:docstring: Set the USB device policy for a specified VM.

arg.name: uuid
arg.tp:docstring: UUID of VM to query policy for.

arg.name: policy
arg.tp:docstring: Policy for specified VM, as XML.

method.name: new_vm
method.tp:docstring: Tell daemon a new VM has been started.

arg.name: dom_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of newly started VM.

method.name: vm_stopped
method.tp:docstring: Tell daemon a VM is stopping.

arg.name: dom_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of stopping VM.

method.name: list_devices
method.tp:docstring: Enumerate the USB devices plugged into the system.

arg.name: devices
arg.tp:docstring: List of IDs of devices in the system.

tp:docstring.p: Connection states are defined as follows:

ul.li: 0 Device not in use by any VM
1 Assigned to another VM which is off
2 Assigned to another VM which is running
3 Blocked by policy for specified VM
5 In use by specified VM and flagged "sticky"
6 Flagged as "sticky" assigned to specified VM, but not currently in use
7 Special platform device, listed purely for information
8 HiD device in use by dom0
9 HiD device in use by dom0, but "sticky" assigned to an off VM
10 External CD drive in use by dom0
11 External CD drive in use by dom0, but "sticky" assigned to an off VM

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of device to query.

arg.name: vm_uuid
arg.tp:docstring: UUID of VM to get information relative to.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: Name of device.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: Connection state of device.

arg.name: vm_assigned
arg.tp:docstring: UUID of VM device is assigned to (if any).

arg.name: detail
arg.tp:docstring: Name detail, for mouse-over text.

method.name: assign_device
method.tp:docstring: Assign a device to a VM.

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: id of device to assign

arg.name: vm_uuid
arg.tp:docstring: UUID of VM to assign device to.

method.name: unassign_device
method.tp:docstring: Unassign a device from a VM.

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of device to unassign.

method.name: set_sticky
method.tp:docstring: Set or clear the sticky assignment flag for a device.

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of device to alter sticky flag for.

arg.name: sticky
arg.tp:docstring: Set (1), or clear (0) sticky flag.

method.name: name_device
method.tp:docstring: Set the user visible name for a device.

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of device to set name for.

arg.name: name
arg.tp:docstring: name to set for device

method.name: state
method.tp:docstring: Dump daemon state, for debugging only.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: Daemon state in human readable form.

signal.name: device_rejected
signal.tp:docstring: A USB device has been rejected due to a policy.

arg.name: device_name
arg.tp:docstring: User-friendly name of device rejected

arg.name: reason
arg.tp:docstring: Human-readable description of reason for rejection

signal.name: devices_changed
signal.tp:docstring: Device list previously given out may be out of date, re-enumerate.

signal.name: device_info_changed
signal.tp:docstring: Information previously given out regarding device may be out of date, re-query.

arg.name: dev_id
arg.tp:docstring: ID of device needing re-query.
